publications.title: Generation of a gene-corrected human isogenic iPSC line from an Alzheimer’s disease iPSC line carrying the London mutation in APP (V717I)

genomic_modifications.description: Gene correction of APP V717I (London mutation) with inclusion of a silent PAM-site mutation to enhance homology directed repair; edited locus reported as rs63750264 (GRCh38; Chr21:25891784 G > A).

genomic_characterisation.karyotype: 46, Resolution 450-500 (sex chromosomes cropped to maintain blinding of gender identity)
genomic_characterisation.summary: Copy number variation analysis performed using Illumina HumanCore/Infinium CoreExome platform (VCGS). Analysis represented as log R ratio and B allele frequency; no deletions, insertions or aneuploidies reported. Sex chromosomes were cropped to maintain blinding of donor gender.

induced_derivation.non_int_vector_name: Episomal vectors (containing OCT4, SOX2, KLF4, L-MYC, LIN28 and shRNA against p53)

ethics.institutional_HREC: University of Melbourne Human Research Ethics Committee
